languages.text: "Поверьте, Ваша Светлость, имей я желание участвовать в войнах и мятежах, стала бы бандиткой, а не барменом".
"Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wanted to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."
languages.original_text: "Поверьте, Ваша Светлость, имей я желание участвовать в войнах и мятежах, стала бы бандиткой, а не барменом".

traits.locale_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wished to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wished to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."

traits.locale_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wanted to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: “说真的，大人，如果我真想参与战争和叛乱，我早早就去当强盗了，根本不会当什么酒吧老板。”
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wanted to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."

traits.locale_text: “说真的，大人，如果我真想参与战争和叛乱，我早早地就去当强盗了，根本不会当什么酒吧老板。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: 「信じてください、陛下。本当に戦争や反乱に参加したかったのなら、私は最初からバーテンダーではなく、盗賊になっていましたよ」
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wanted to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."

traits.locale_text: 「信じてください、陛下。本当に戦争や反乱に参加したかったのなら、私は最初からバーテンダーではなく、盗賊になっていましたよ」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: «Créame, mi{mf|lord|lady}, si hubiera deseado participar en guerras y rebeliones me habría hecho bandida en vez de camarera».
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wanted to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."

traits.locale_text: «Créame, mi{mf|lord|lady}, si hubiera deseado participar en guerras y rebeliones me habría hecho bandida en vez de camarera».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "Glaubt mir, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, würde ich an Kriegen und Rebellionen teilnehmen wollen, wäre ich Banditin geworden, nicht Barkeeperin."
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wanted to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt mir, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, würde ich an Kriegen und Rebellionen teilnehmen, wäre ich Banditin geworden, nicht Barkeeperin."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: « Croyez-moi, Votre Seigneurie... Si j'avais voulu participer à des guerres ou à des rébellions, je serais devenue bandit, pas tenancière de bar. »
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wanted to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."

traits.locale_text: « Croyez-moi, Votre Seigneurie... Si j'avais voulu participer à des guerres ou à des rébellions, je serais devenue bandit, pas tenancière de bar. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Octaviana_Ch04

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, inanın bana. Savaşlara ve isyanlara katılmak istesem haydut olurdum, meyhaneci değil."
languages.original_text: "Trust me, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, if I'd wanted to take part in wars and rebellions, I'd have become a bandit, not a bartender."
